mapper.select: SELECT ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATED_DATE ,TO_CHAR(UPDATED_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE(ID, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{noticeCategory},#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
